Summary: Vertical contrail seen from Tempe Arizona
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile returning home from meeting with friends for breakfast my girlfriend and I were traveling east down Baseline Rd. in Tempe Arizona at about 10:00 AM and I noticed a contrail being made that seemed to go straight up, we watched for a while and it did not seem to be an optical illusion (I am a Land Surveyor and my eye for angles and distance is notable. Neither of us could see what what was making it. I asked my girlfriend to take some pictures with my Droid and the last couple she took without looking through the windshield. The contrail just seemed to continue straight up as we observed while driving east. After a few minutes we had to turn south and get on the freeway and by the time we were able to stop and look again it was out of sight and the contrail has dissipated. I have more pictures if it would help show the trajectory.
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Tempe
There were no other sightings in Tempe on or around April 15th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
